General.Name: Bioptro Inc.
General.Description: Bioptro Inc. manufactures and sells automation equipment for factory automation and measurement. The company researches and develops electrical test equipment for the PCB industry. Its products include multi-arrayed FPC/PCB, semi-conductor package PCB, and mobile-phone and module PCB; multi-arrayed touch films; and multi-head screw fastening systems. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
